snippet: A former drug dealer was found guilty on Friday at his retrial in the 2005 arson deaths of a woman and eight children at a birthday sleepover in what was Cleveland’s deadliest house fire.
abstract: Former drug dealer Antun Lewis is found guilty at his retrial in 2005 arson deaths of Medeia Carter and eight children at a birthday sleepover in what was Cleveland’s deadliest house fire.
lead_paragraph: A former drug dealer was found guilty on Friday at his retrial in the 2005 arson deaths of a woman and eight children at a birthday sleepover in what was Cleveland’s deadliest house fire.

headline.main: Ohio: Man Is Convicted in Arson That Killed 9
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Man Is Convicted In Arson That Killed 9
